room_title: Escape room "Tualatin Valley Room" by Escape Space Games in Portland
review: Had a great time doing the Tualatin Valley room. It was challenging enough that it took us the full time but we Escaped, yay!!

room_title: Escape room "Tualatin Valley Room" by Escape Space Games in Portland
review: Such a great family activity! We have a hard time finding things that grandparents, parents, and kids will all enjoy and this place was perfect! We did the Tualatin Valley room and the puzzles were great! We escaped with 30sec left and only used one hint! Great great great evening!
